source.sqlReaderQuery: select NAME ,ADDRESS,CITY,COUNTRY from ADDRESS_COMMON where country = 'INDIA'
select * from ADDRESS_COMMON where country not in ( 'USA' , 'INDIA')
select max(TrxnDate) as max_input from IfTable_Input
select max(TrxnDate) as max_output from IfTable_Output
select * from address_common where country not in ('India' ,'UK','USA')

properties.description: Task2:- Create and set a variable value as ID based on the Max transaction date from iftable_output

scriptLines: source1 derive(case = case( SALARY > 10000, "high" , case(SALARY>5000, "medium", "low"))) ~> derivedColumn1
